name: Super Rolling Heroes
description:
Bounce and break everything while you roll downhill in this challenging and unforgiving physics-based platformer!
Push your skills to the limit as you destroy every object while maintaining momentum, exploding, bouncing, using power ups and avoiding all kinds of deadly obstacles.
Simple yet highly-tuned physics gameplay with lots of levels, secrets and rewards to customize your hero.

FEATURES:

• Rolling Hell: an extremely hard mode that challenge you to beat the game in a single run. Play across the connected 100 levels of the game without stopping and with a limited amount of lives.
• Customize your hero with different expressions, clothes, costumes and accessories.
• Learn how different objects react!
• More than 100 challenging levels that increase in difficulty as the game progresses!
• Amazing power ups and secrets!
